forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms between 4pm and 5pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1am and 5am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 65, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. West southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 78 in the afternoon. North wind around 8 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. North northeast wind 2 to 8 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
